Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What sustainable or environmental practices have been implemented?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result: The company has implemented several sustainable and environmental practices. Some of them include sourcing their core ingredient (curcumin) from solar powered farms, using all-natural ingredients free of additives like gluten, soy, dairy, added preservatives, artificial sweeteners, and added colors/flavors, and considering the impact of their decisions on various stakeholders including workers, customers, suppliers, community, and the environment.

Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: Are there any events or initiatives focused on environmental conservation? If yet then list 10 such events.
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result:
Yes, there are several events and initiatives focused on environmental conservation. However, providing a comprehensive list of all such events would be too extensive. Instead, I can mention a few notable examples:

1. Earth Day (April 22)
2. Global Climate Strike (September 20)
3. World Environment Day (June 5th)
4. United Nations Climate Change Conferences
5. The Green New Deal movement
6. Extinction Rebellion protests
7. The Paris Agreement
8. The UN Biodiversity Conference
9. The Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora (CITES)

These events and initiatives represent a small fraction of the numerous activities, campaigns, and movements dedicated to environmental conservation around the world.

Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What environmental impact metrics are reported?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result:
The text mentions several environmental impact metrics related to different aspects of the food and beverage industry. These include:

1. Acid Rain and Oxygen-Free Zones: Studies show that plastic and glass bottles, as well as cans, have varying levels of impact on these environmental issues. Plastic and glass bottle production releases sulfur dioxide, which contributes to acid rain, while can production requires significant amounts of electricity, potentially increasing sulfur dioxide pollution. Both types of packaging material extraction also contribute to phosphate releases, harming rivers and coastal seas.
2. Carbon Footprint Reduction: Tall, slim aluminum cans used by ZYN are lighter in weight, take up less space, and require less packaging. This reduction in packaging helps minimize emissions when shipping products. Recycling aluminum cans saves approximately 0.2 grams of CO2 per can, demonstrating the positive environmental impact of recycling.
3. Energy Savings: Switching to aluminum cans has helped ZYN reduce emissions associated with shipping products. A 12-pack of aluminum cans can save enough energy to power a standard passenger car for up to three miles. Aluminum cans can be recycled infinitely without any loss of quality, making them a sustainable choice.

These metrics highlight various ways in which ZYN and other companies in the food and beverage sector can work towards reducing their environmental impact.

Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.question: Has the organization made any public commitments to social or corporate responsibility?
Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.result: Yes, based on the provided information, the organization has made several public commitments to social and corporate responsibility. These include being a certified B Corporation, which requires adherence to high social and environmental performance standards, public transparency, and legal accountability. Additionally, they have committed to prioritize people, planet, and purpose alongside profits, demonstrating their dedication to responsible business practices. Furthermore, the company has shown support for various causes such as veteran assistance through partnerships with likeminded organizations.

Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.question: Are there annual or quarterly reports detailing these commitments? If yes, then summarize.
Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.result: Based on the information provided, it seems that ZYN does not publish annual or quarterly reports specifically detailing their commitments to social and environmental performance, public transparency, and legal accountability. However, they mention being certified as a B Corporation, which requires meeting certain high standards in these areas. As a B Corp, ZYN must adhere to the B Corporation Code of Conduct and undergo regular assessments to maintain their certification. While there might not be specific report documents available online, ZYN's commitment to social and environmental responsibility can still be inferred from their status as a B Corp and their emphasis on sustainability throughout their website.

Commerce & Products.question: What products, services, or technologies are available?
Commerce & Products.result: Based on the provided information, it appears that both companies, it Fitness and Zyn, offer unique products and services. It Fitness offers remote training services tailored to individual needs, while Zyn creates natural supplements inspired by traditional Ayurvedic medicine. Additionally, Zyn is committed to sustainability and reducing their environmental impact by transitioning away from single-use plastics.

source.content: and distance Wayne and Steven have big plans for it Fitness Once the two retire from active-duty service they plan to open a gym facility in the United States to further that 1-on-1 connection with others “Right now when we train people it’s typically from a distance” says Wayne “for the longest time I would have people send me videos of their gym and what they had available and then design workout plans for them based on the equipment they had” This has been a successful venture for it Fitness and one that makes their organization unique given that not a lot of trainers apps or programs offer that kind of personalization especially remotely As successful as this method has been Wayne and Steven want that personal connection with their trainees through offering a brick and mortar gym “There is a sense of intimacy that comes with helping people achieve their goals in person that differs from achieving them from a distance and we eventually want to be able to provide that” says Wayne

the technicalities of this business like Qasim mentioned but our new mindset is the ‘learn as we grow’ approach” Qasim “I expected a lot of hard work growing pains and looking at everything with an eyes wide open approach in terms of the challenges Like any business and life itself it's the unknowns that you have to be prepared to navigate with common senseWe are passionate about growing this business passionate about our product we know it provides results–while it has been challenging; it has also been extremely rewarding and that motivates us to come in every day and work harder”  Asim “I always knew there was going to be a lot of hard work That is something that I always look forward to–the stress problem-solving daily tasks–it has become a part of my everyday life and something that I have come to appreciate and enjoy The hardest part for me has been understanding the different elements that make up a business and how those pieces fit together to help everything grow Learning

Commerce & Products.question: Are there any promotional events, expos, or sales for these offerings? If yes, list them.
Commerce & Products.result:
Yes, there are several promotional events, expos, and sales for these offerings. Some of the notable ones include:

* Participation at The Chicago Run Show on June 4th and 5th (Booth H24) at the Chicago DEC Convention Center.
* Limited-time new snack offers with discount codes available for a limited time period.
* Summer events and experiences such as marathons, triathlons, cycling events, and more across various colleges and universities.
* Ongoing sales and promotions on products, including free items and commissions for online sales.
* Student ambassadors receiving a paid stipend and access to networking opportunities with co-founders and industry professionals.

Employment & Opportunities.question: What employment or educational opportunities are currently available?
Employment & Opportunities.result:
Based on the provided information, there are several employment and educational opportunities available. These include:

1. Micro-Internship with ZYN: This opportunity allows students to gain hands-on experience while working closely with the ZYN team. It combines elements of internships and brand ambassadorships.
2. ZYN Wellness Ambassador: Students who are passionate about health and wellness can become ZYN Wellness Ambassadors. They will promote ZYN products and share their experiences with friends and peers.
3. Educational Resources: Participants in these programs will have access to various educational materials and resources related to health and wellness, helping them expand their knowledge in these areas.
4. Networking Opportunities: Through these programs, students will have the chance to connect with the co-founders of ZYN and other professionals in the industry, which could lead to future job or collaboration opportunities.
5. Resume Building: Engaging in these programs will allow students to add relevant experience to their resumes, making them more attractive to potential employers.
6. Free Product and Commission: Participants in these programs will receive free ZYN products and have the opportunity to earn commissions for successful sales referrals.
7. Limited Time Commitment: With a commitment of only 3 hours per month, these programs offer flexible schedules for busy students.

Employment & Opportunities.question: What employee or participant benefits are highlighted?
Employment & Opportunities.result:
Employee or participant benefits that are highlighted include:

1. Learning opportunities: The program emphasizes learning through micro-internships, providing students with valuable hands-on experiences and exposure to different aspects of business operations.
2. Networking: Participants will have access to the co-founders of ZYN as well as other networking opportunities, allowing them to build connections within the industry and potentially open doors for future career prospects.
3. Free product: As a Zyn Wellness Ambassador, participants will receive free product samples, which they can share with friends and family members or use themselves to test the effectiveness of the products.
4. Paid events: Some ambassadors may also have the chance to participate in paid tabling/sampling events, giving them additional income while promoting the brand on their campuses.

Financials & Funding.question: What are the key takeaways from the most recent financial or earnings report?
Financials & Funding.result: Based on the conversation provided, neither Asim nor Qasim have explicitly discussed their company's latest financial or earnings report. However, they both mention learning curves related to navigating unfamiliar industries and adapting to new roles after careers in finance. Additionally, they emphasize the importance of staying focused on their passions and goals while facing challenges and obstacles along the way. While these insights may not directly address the specific details of their company's financial performance, they provide valuable lessons on resilience, adaptation, and perseverance in the face of adversity.

source.content: mention–no physical altercations…yet😂”  AsimCreating a family business and products that we are proud of as well as teaching my kids what goes into that process and the amount of work that it takes has been a huge accomplishment”  Qasim “The frustrating and exciting part for me is that this is a new industry that we didn’t have experience in We came in very green Learning how the industry works trying to navigate it and putting our own outside perspectives on it has been a challenge but also a very exciting journey”  Asim “For me it's everything that is outside of our control As a business we can do everything right and the minute that our product leaves our dock we’ve lost control It’s the constituents in the middle that can sometimes cause waves that we have to solve for and plan around to ensure the product arrives at its end location safely on time and in the best possible condition” Qasim “I spent 20+ years in finance and the skills that are required to build a consumer-focused

the technicalities of this business like Qasim mentioned but our new mindset is the ‘learn as we grow’ approach” Qasim “I expected a lot of hard work growing pains and looking at everything with an eyes wide open approach in terms of the challenges Like any business and life itself it's the unknowns that you have to be prepared to navigate with common senseWe are passionate about growing this business passionate about our product we know it provides results–while it has been challenging; it has also been extremely rewarding and that motivates us to come in every day and work harder”  Asim “I always knew there was going to be a lot of hard work That is something that I always look forward to–the stress problem-solving daily tasks–it has become a part of my everyday life and something that I have come to appreciate and enjoy The hardest part for me has been understanding the different elements that make up a business and how those pieces fit together to help everything grow Learning

a start-up company You don’t know how things are going to turn out but it is always worth it when you are following your passion–it can be scary but it will always find a way to work out” Qasim “We want to continue to share what we believe in and what has worked so well for our parents and ancestors within our culture to more people in the west We are looking forward to growing our business to further give back in our community which is part of our B-Corp mission ”  Asim “We always strive to bring nature’s goodness to humanity We are going to continue to lean into our blend of Turmeric and Black Pepper for absorption and create channels with that through the use of new product launches including moving out of single-use plastic We use cookies on our website to give you the best shopping experience By using this site you agree to its use of cookies

to ensure the product arrives at its end location safely on time and in the best possible condition” Qasim “I spent 20+ years in finance and the skills that are required to build a consumer-focused business are very different from a finance perspective  I’d say my life experiences outside of my previous career have played a larger role in building ZYNHowever I have learned a lot having been in finance which has served the business well in terms of maintaining a financially-healthy company” Asim “Same hereI was in the finance industry as well for 20+ years wearing a suit and tie every day now it’s trucker hats and flip flopsIn a start-up entrepreneurial environment there is no structure no processes We have to figure everything out ourselves Having our foundation in finance has helped with the technicalities of this business like Qasim mentioned but our new mindset is the ‘learn as we grow’ approach” Qasim “I expected a lot of hard work growing pains and looking at everything with an

source.content: New snacks on sale now for a limited time Use code NEW for 15 off As the rapid development of technology continues to grow and expand yearly so does the world around it Looking back into history  years ago we were not confident of the existence beyond our solar system; now fast-forward to present-day NASA is able to take the first set of high-resolution images of galaxies stars and planets millions of miles away at a record-breaking speed  So what does this mean Well for many service members this includes transferring to a new and upcoming branch within the Military; Space Force As we continue to progress as a society we can better understand additional threats that may come our way including asteroids and debris and work to plan ahead to protect the world in and around our planet  Service members nationwide including Technical Sergeant Gonzalez-Parish have taken on their own journey as they transition to this new and upcoming branch  Eduardo Gonzalez-Parish is a Technical Sergeant

protection That will slowly move over to Space Force as time goes on As the branch further develops we will be able to see exactly where that line is drawn”  Additional Space Force operations include GPS tracking engineering global networks to test military capabilities both offensive and defensive cyber protection rocket launches and exploration and intelligence As the United States continues to navigate the vast unknown outside of our world Space Force works as a crucial step and protection defense in that execution process  Although the Space Force branch is new–it is growing rapidly as technology advances Gonzalez mentions “There is space exploration going on every single day regardless of how that looks We as a branch are constantly monitoring and working alongside our government and NASA to help protect and defend our country against any and all external threats” Here at ZYN we want to sincerely thank Technical Sergeant Gonzalez-Parish for his time and knowledge regarding the

are contributing back to the environment in a healthy and prosperous way Our core ingredient CURCUMIN made from turmeric comes from farms that are run on Solar Power energy thus reducing the carbon footprint Heading into the coming years we are devoted and motivated to continue our support for the planet people and community As a certified B-corporation we are excited to continue to give back and provide full-transparency of who we are what we do and the purpose of our intentions as a brand We along with other B-corporations are inspired to be the change that sparks a new sense of healing and growth throughout the world We could not have done it without the support of our community Thank you  To follow along on our journey follow us on Instagram Share with us in the comments below what else you would like to know or any additional questions you may have We use cookies on our website to give you the best shopping experience By using this site you agree to its use of cookies

the best in the world but to be the best the world  This is a major milestone since it signifies to the world that we are more than just another profit motivated company  In fact it shows the world that we are a socially ethically and environmentally responsible company that places highest value on people planet and purpose along with profits” stated the ZYN team  Certified B Corporations are businesses that meet the highest standards of verified social and environmental performance public transparency and legal accountability to balance profit and purpose They are legally required to consider the impact of their decisions on their workers customers suppliers community and the environment  From the company’s supply chain and input materials to its charitable giving and employee benefits B Corp Certification proves the certified business is meeting the highest standards of verified performance  B Corps are accelerating a global culture shift to redefine success in business and build a

Research & Innovation.question: Are there any ongoing or upcoming research projects or innovation initiatives? If yes then list them
Research & Innovation.result:
Based on the provided information, I cannot provide specific details about ongoing or upcoming research projects or innovation initiatives related to ZYN or the broader industry. However, I can mention some general trends and developments in the field of natural remedies, herbal medicine, and sustainability practices. These might indirectly impact ZYN's future plans and initiatives. Some examples include:

1. Continued research on the medicinal properties of turmeric and other plant-based ingredients.
2. Development of new delivery methods or formulations to enhance the bioavailability and efficacy of natural remedies.
3. Expansion of sustainable sourcing practices for raw materials, such as solar-powered turmeric farming.
4. Innovative packaging solutions to reduce waste and promote eco-friendliness.
5. Collaborations between companies, academia, and non-profit organizations to drive research and development in the natural products sector.
6. Governmental regulations and policies related to dietary supplements, herbal medicine, and food safety.
7. Emerging technologies, such as artificial intelligence (AI) and blockchain, being applied to improve transparency, traceability, and quality control in the natural products industry.

Please note that these points are based on general trends and developments in the industry rather than specific information about ZYN's ongoing or upcoming projects.

that meet the highest standards of verified social and environmental performance public transparency and legal accountability to balance profit and purpose They are legally required to consider the impact of their decisions on their workers customers suppliers community and the environment At ZYN we pride ourselves on focusing on the 3 major P’s People Planet Purpose It is in the root of all that we do and what we strive for as a business We are 1 of  B corporations in the US Food  Beverage Sector and 1 of 4 across the world Learn More Being environmentally friendly and sustainable is a top priority for us If there is an issue with your order please contact  Currently we only ship within the United States We are working on shipping internationally though so hold tight We appreciate your patience and interest  We use cookies on our website to give you the best shopping experience By using this site you agree to its use of cookies

the best in the world but to be the best the world  This is a major milestone since it signifies to the world that we are more than just another profit motivated company  In fact it shows the world that we are a socially ethically and environmentally responsible company that places highest value on people planet and purpose along with profits” stated the ZYN team  Certified B Corporations are businesses that meet the highest standards of verified social and environmental performance public transparency and legal accountability to balance profit and purpose They are legally required to consider the impact of their decisions on their workers customers suppliers community and the environment  From the company’s supply chain and input materials to its charitable giving and employee benefits B Corp Certification proves the certified business is meeting the highest standards of verified performance  B Corps are accelerating a global culture shift to redefine success in business and build a

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: Are there any joint events, projects, or initiatives? If yes then list them.
Collaboration & Partnerships.result: Based on the provided information, there doesn't seem to be any specific mention of joint events, projects, or initiatives between the company and their cause partner One Mile. However, both parties share a common goal of promoting togetherness and giving back to the community. They might collaborate on future activities or events that align with their shared values and objectives.

mention–no physical altercations…yet😂”  AsimCreating a family business and products that we are proud of as well as teaching my kids what goes into that process and the amount of work that it takes has been a huge accomplishment”  Qasim “The frustrating and exciting part for me is that this is a new industry that we didn’t have experience in We came in very green Learning how the industry works trying to navigate it and putting our own outside perspectives on it has been a challenge but also a very exciting journey”  Asim “For me it's everything that is outside of our control As a business we can do everything right and the minute that our product leaves our dock we’ve lost control It’s the constituents in the middle that can sometimes cause waves that we have to solve for and plan around to ensure the product arrives at its end location safely on time and in the best possible condition” Qasim “I spent 20+ years in finance and the skills that are required to build a consumer-focused

the technicalities of this business like Qasim mentioned but our new mindset is the ‘learn as we grow’ approach” Qasim “I expected a lot of hard work growing pains and looking at everything with an eyes wide open approach in terms of the challenges Like any business and life itself it's the unknowns that you have to be prepared to navigate with common senseWe are passionate about growing this business passionate about our product we know it provides results–while it has been challenging; it has also been extremely rewarding and that motivates us to come in every day and work harder”  Asim “I always knew there was going to be a lot of hard work That is something that I always look forward to–the stress problem-solving daily tasks–it has become a part of my everyday life and something that I have come to appreciate and enjoy The hardest part for me has been understanding the different elements that make up a business and how those pieces fit together to help everything grow Learning

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: What are the mutual objectives and outcomes expected from these collaborations?
Collaboration & Partnerships.result: Through their partnerships with like-minded organizations, Zyn and One Mile aim to achieve several shared goals and outcomes. These include promoting togetherness within the community, helping veterans and former athletes stay healthy and mentally motivated, and giving back to the community through various initiatives. Additionally, both companies strive to raise awareness about the importance of teamwork, unity, and supporting local causes. Overall, the collaborative efforts between Zyn and its cause partner One Mile are focused on fostering a sense of belonging, improving the overall wellbeing of individuals, and contributing positively to the community.

to ensure the product arrives at its end location safely on time and in the best possible condition” Qasim “I spent 20+ years in finance and the skills that are required to build a consumer-focused business are very different from a finance perspective  I’d say my life experiences outside of my previous career have played a larger role in building ZYNHowever I have learned a lot having been in finance which has served the business well in terms of maintaining a financially-healthy company” Asim “Same hereI was in the finance industry as well for 20+ years wearing a suit and tie every day now it’s trucker hats and flip flopsIn a start-up entrepreneurial environment there is no structure no processes We have to figure everything out ourselves Having our foundation in finance has helped with the technicalities of this business like Qasim mentioned but our new mindset is the ‘learn as we grow’ approach” Qasim “I expected a lot of hard work growing pains and looking at everything with an

a start-up company You don’t know how things are going to turn out but it is always worth it when you are following your passion–it can be scary but it will always find a way to work out” Qasim “We want to continue to share what we believe in and what has worked so well for our parents and ancestors within our culture to more people in the west We are looking forward to growing our business to further give back in our community which is part of our B-Corp mission ”  Asim “We always strive to bring nature’s goodness to humanity We are going to continue to lean into our blend of Turmeric and Black Pepper for absorption and create channels with that through the use of new product launches including moving out of single-use plastic We use cookies on our website to give you the best shopping experience By using this site you agree to its use of cookies
